[quote=“asshole_rule, post:43, topic:401244”][quote author=lmfao beat link=topic=498306.msg3992361#msg3992361 date=1336771071]
Hey guys.
I’m new to RSPS coding and so i need help.
I did everything same as tutorial and i did fine no errors and so…
But i can’t run my server source sided
here is the error ||
V
Exception in thread "main"Exception in thread "Thread-1"java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Could not initialize class server.Server
[/quote]

Have you compiled your server yet?[/quote]

thanks for trying to help me but i fixed the error it was because i left spaces in npc-spawn config file.

item.title: Project insanity, adding Dungeoneering!
item.dc:creator: @cedrick cedrick
item.description:
@cedrick wrote:

im getting this error now!

i added everything without any error when i compile but now my run-server stopped working

look what it say¸

[code]-------------------------------------------------------------
GeniuS memleak 2.0 Created Im A Baaws!

                     UPDATES:

fixed EVERY SINGLE GLITCH from the erasedpkz source
added custom dung interfaces(not finished)
alot of custom commands
about everything you can think of

GeniuS ~ By Im A Baaws

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6
at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:365)
at server.world.ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:33)
at server.Server.(Server.java:62)
Appuyez sur une touche pour continuer…[/code]
plz help

item.title: Project insanity, adding Dungeoneering!
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Well ive decided to edit this a lot ive added dung leveling ive spawned npcs on 5 floors picked out a better 4th floor added dung floors requirements to telle there and edited the dung tab added the dung skill to the actuall skill tab picked out a couple different bosses and made all 10 bosses give exp after you kill them added dung quick chat expect a new project thread soon.
